name: bacass-bacterial-assembly
title: Bacass: Bacterial Genome Assembly & Annotation
description: De novo bacterial genome assembly from Illumina/Nanopore/PacBio with automated annotation (Prokka/Bakta). Produces complete bacterial genomes with gene predictions for comparative genomics and AMR screening. Samplesheet format: `ID,R1,R2,LongFastQ,Fast5,GenomeSize`
content:
Bacass: Bacterial Assembly

Complete bacterial genome assembly pipeline supporting short reads (Illumina), long reads (Nanopore/PacBio), and hybrid assemblies. Includes quality control, assembly, polishing, and annotation.

Applications

  • Pathogen Genomics: Assemble outbreak isolates
  • AMR Surveillance: Identify resistance genes
  • Comparative Genomics: Build pangenomes
  • Type Strain Sequencing: Complete reference genomes

Key Outputs

  • Assembled Genome: Contigs/scaffolds FASTA
  • Annotations: Prokka/Bakta GFF/GBK files
  • Assembly QC: QUAST metrics (N50, completeness)
  • Species ID: Kraken2 taxonomic classification

Perfect for: Bacterial genome assembly • Pathogen genomics • AMR screening • Hybrid assembly
